result.title: Practise abstract RP2
result.description: The practice abstracts to be released in the RP2 will summarize the outcomes of the standardized approaches that the project developed/implemented for the early detection of the pathogen, for the surveys and identification of insect vectors, for mapping the potential risk for Xf spread in EU: They will mainly consist on eductional and training materials such as: - Practise abstract (1): will present of the ongoing activities towards the deliverable D4.3, D4.4 and D9.2 related to the best practices for sampling and diagnosis of X. fastidiosa. - Practise abstract (2): will include the methodology of sampling and collection of insect vectors - Practise abstract (3): will include the maps of the potential distribution and climate suitability for Xf in EU as foreseen with the deliverable D8.2 and D8.3
